properties.description: Accounts API has operations to retrieve information related to account like account balances, transactions, account level outputs, notifications, notes, tasks and payment schedule, put a hold on an account or release a hold on an account, put a watch on account, write off balances on an account, change payment method, due day, mailing days and governing policy on an account.

Accounts.description: This will contain multiple instances of Account object. Account object contains details such as account number, account contact name, output delivery method etc of an account in billing system.

AccountSummary.title: AccountSummary

demandNoticeCount.description: Count of demand notice sent for account.

returnedPaymentCount.description: Count of returned payment for account.

policyLegalStatusCode.description: Alphanumeric code identifying the legal status of policy. This must be a supported code. List of supported  Policy Legal Status Code along with description can be retrieved by passing domainType equal to ‘PolicyLegalStatus’ to List of Values API.

developer.description: Verbose, plain language description of the problem for the app developer with hints about how to fix it.

user.description: Pass this message on to the app user if needed.

moreinfo.description: HTTP Link to more information page.

correlationid.description: Used to identify the record cache if the pagination logic uses a server side cache.

pageSize.description: Number of records to be returned in a single page. API will use default value if this is not supplied

totalRecords.description: Total number of records. This can be used by the consumer to decide the page size.

pageNumber.description: Page number of the current records.

lastPageNumber.description: Page number of the last page based on total records.

startIndex.description: Start index/ID of records in the current page. This is the start cursor of the record set representing a page.This can be continutation token to fetch the previous page.

endIndex.description: End index/ID of records in the current page.This is the end cursor of the record set representing a page. This can be continutation token to fetch the next page.

Pagination.description: Pagination Metada which is used to communicate pagination related fields between consumer and API implementation

next.description: Represents http link to access the next page

prev.description: Represents http link to access the previous page

first.description: Represents http link to access the first page

last.description: Represents http link to access the last page

PageLink.description: Represents first, last, previous and next page , http links in a pagination context.

taskAge.description: Age of the task is number of days elapsed since the start date of task.

TaskDetail.description: This object will have details about tasks for a policy or account.
